faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle EBS R12 Financials Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle EBS R12 Financials Training covers essential modules such as General Ledger, Accounts Payables, Accounts Receivables, Cash Management, E-Business Tax, Multi-Org, Fixed Assets, iExpenses, and Purchasing. These modules are designed to provide comprehensive knowledge of financial operations using Oracle EBS R12. A detailed syllabus is available in our course brochure.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Live training sessions are conducted from Monday to Saturday, with 1-hour sessions each day. This schedule ensures consistent learning and hands-on experience with Oracle EBS R12 Financials.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer weekend-only batches. All sessions are scheduled Monday through Saturday to maintain continuity in learning.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide recorded sessions for learners who prefer self-paced study. However, please note that these sessions do not include live doubt-clearing support.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, internship opportunities are available based on your performance in mock evaluations. These internships provide practical exposure to Oracle EBS R12 Financials modules and real-world financial scenarios.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, the Oracle EBS R12 Financials Training is offered as a complete package. We do not offer individual modules separately

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive resume preparation support tailored to Oracle EBS R12 Financials roles. This includes highlighting your skills, training, and project experience.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, you will need a laptop or desktop to install and access the Oracle EBS Financials environment and complete hands-on exercises during the training.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for This Training?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is required. The course is beginner-friendly and starts from the basics of Oracle EBS Financials. A basic understanding of accounting or finance concepts is helpful but not mandatory.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The course starts with foundational concepts and gradually covers advanced topics in Oracle EBS R12 Financials, making it suitable for both freshers and experienced professionals.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer full job placement support including resume building, mock interviews, and interview preparation tailored to Oracle EBS Financials roles.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Oracle EBS Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we help you prepare for Oracle EBS certification exams by offering sample questions, study material, and expert mentoring.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, all recorded sessions will be available for 1 year. We also provide detailed study materials, including step-by-step process documents and visual guides with screenshots.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Mock Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer module-specific interview questions and conduct mock interviews to prepare you for real-time job interviews.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide 4 months of Oracle EBS R12 Financials practice instance access. Please note that installation is required on your system, and we offer full guidance and support during the setup process.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can rejoin any future batch within your 1-year access period at no additional cost.

faqs.question: Will I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, upon successful completion, you will receive a Course Completion Certificate in Oracle EBS R12 Financials from Tech Leads IT.

faqs.question: Is Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No coding knowledge is required. This is a functional training program focused on financial business processes and application configuration.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer personalized one-on-one training upon request. Pricing will differ from standard group training batches.
